metadata.title: CVE-2021-28166 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In Eclipse Mosquitto version 2.0.0 to 2.0.9, if an authenticated clientthat had connected with MQTT v5 sent a crafted CONNACK message to thebroker, a NULL pointer dereference would occur.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto1 - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1
libmosquittopp1 - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1
mosquitto - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1
mosquitto-clients - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.11-1ubuntu1').
